don't fit in a box in her self-help blog

common signs of genius especially in

people like this often have a wide

you are selective because they prefer

in fact one study by psychologist Lee

Geniuses are so selective about who they

you're highly observant in an article
for psychology today best-selling

will intend to notice their environment

but maybe you're a bit clueless too do

you're the dumbest smart person I know

if that's the case you can at least take

Notorious for not knowing something as

Common Sense psychologist Dr Michael

because highly intelligent people have

you have a rich inner World psychologist

introvert Advantage writes that
introverts have a longer neural pathway
for processing stimuli which is
associated with better long-term memory
planning and an improved ability to
attend to one's thoughts and feelings
even at the same time so on a
neurological level introverts differ
from extroverts in that they're more

World fulfilled with novel thoughts and

you have a strong sense of self last but

Trailblazers since they're more inclined
